function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Increased contamination and heat loads from people and equipment","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Loss of industry-level details due to country-level data analysis","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data underestimates true sales figures and installed base of robots","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of robot data beyond 2018 limits the analysis of pandemic impact on robot adoption","category":"Wealth Production","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Industry-level labor and capital-related data available only until 2014, limiting the analysis of pandemic impact","category":"Wealth Production","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of mathematical models and calculations","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient documentation and attribution","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pandemic episodes impacting labor market","category":"Working","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Automation leading to inequality and unemployment","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Acceleration of robot adoption displacing low-skilled workers","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in acquiring new and challenging skill sets leading to a persistent increase in dropouts","category":"Education","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Pandemics leading to increases in the gini coefficient and inequality","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependent on country fixed effects and global business cycle","category":"Finances","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pandemics increasing robot adoption","category":"Wealth Production","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of pandemics on changes in gini coefficients","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pandemics with severe health consequences and significant economic downturn have a statistically significant impact on robot usage.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Using measures that capture the intensity of pandemic events instead of a binary variable for pandemic events","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inclusion of a recession dummy to control for business cycles","category":"Finances","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of log of robot adoption variable to mitigate issues related to the long tail in the distribution of the robotics data","category":"Wealth Production","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pandemic-induced uncertainty leading to increased incentives for automation","category":"Wealth Production","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pandemics leading to an increase in robot adoption over time","category":"Wealth Production","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global value chains dependent on cross-border capital flows","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effect of pandemics on trade and offshoring of the production process","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of robots increasing due to pandemics","category":"Wealth Production","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pandemics affecting robot adoption in industries","category":"Wealth Production","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate control of global business cycles","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sparse coverage of service robot data","category":"Wealth Production","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pandemic events sars, h1n1, mers, ebola","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data collection from multiple sources may lead to inaccuracies and inconsistencies in the data.","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The covid-19 pandemic has reshaped the nature of work, leading to changes in employment structures and job distribution.","category":"Working","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pandemics leading to persistent increases in inequality","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Acceleration in robotization due to pandemics","category":"Wealth Production","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contribution of automation to the growing skill premium and rising inequality","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Industries with higher automation face lower risk of contagion, leading to lower exposure to lockdown-related risks.","category":"Working","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Jobless recoveries are documented after large negative shocks like recessions and pandemics, leading to slow employment recovery.","category":"Working","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global financial crises and pandemics accelerate routine-biased technological change, leading to slow job recovery and increased inequality.","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Layoffs have been higher in industries that can be automated, increasing the risk of permanent job losses during the recovery.","category":"Working","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in robot adoption after pandemics","category":"Wealth Production","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Acceleration of automation and robotization driving inequality","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Acceleration of automation and robotization","category":"Wealth Production","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in telework and automation due to covid-19","category":"Working","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Focus on general mosquito bite prevention may overshadow the importance of disease prevention messages","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in outbreak timing across patches","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases through human mobility","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mosquito-borne virus transmission through human-mosquito interaction","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of real-world variability in occupant behavior and building characteristics may lead to inaccurate exposure assessments.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate simulation of agent interactions may lead to underestimation of occupant exposure in confined spaces.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate representation of human movement in crowd models may lead to underestimation of disease transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for individual attributes in crowd models can result in higher exposure of vulnerable individuals","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of exposed to simulate people movement during pandemics","category":"Health","confidence":"High"}]}
